item.title: [PI] fixing my shop :3 help
item.dc:creator: @l0lc0pt3r l0lc0pt3r
item.description:
@l0lc0pt3r wrote:

ok so im trying to add a shop into my server that accepts ecto tokens instead of coins…heres all of my shop stuff…

stuff in shopassistant.java

		if (c.myShopId == 22) {
                        c.sendMessage(c.getItems().getItemName(removeId)+": currently costs " + getSpecialItemValue(removeId) + " Dung tokens.");
                        return;
int Slot3 = 0;//dung token
				if (Slot3 == -1 && c.myShopId == 22) {
                                        c.sendMessage("You don't have enough dung tokens.");
                                        break;
				}
                if(c.myShopId == 22) {
					if (c.playerItemsN[Slot3] >= TotPrice2) {
						if (c.getItems().freeSlots() > 0) {
							c.getItems().deleteItem(4278, c.getItems().getItemSlot(4278), TotPrice2);
							c.getItems().addItem(itemID, 1);
							Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[c.myShopId][fromSlot] -= 1;
							Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[c.myShopId][fromSlot] = 0;
							if ((fromSlot + 1) > Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[c.myShopId]) {
								Server.shopHandler.ShopItems[c.myShopId][fromSlot] = 0;
							}
						} else {
							c.sendMessage("You don't have enough space in your inventory.");
							break;
						}
					} else {
						c.sendMessage("You don't have Dung Tokens.");
						break;
					}
                }

and now in actionhandler.java i have

case 587:
c.getShops().openShop(22);
break;

when i click the item in the store, it shows “this item currently costs 6748516 dung points” but i cant buy the item -.- also when i dont have tokens with me, it doesnt show the “you don’t have enought points”
im sure this is probably an easy fix, i just cant figure it out. :s any help is appreciated. also i will add anything else that anybody finds needed.

Read full topic
